PreceptDef.label: high
PreceptDef.description:
It's important to live good life on the rimworlds and relax from time to time.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Expectations increased by 1 for everyone in the colony, except elite and supreme, which are unaffected for balance reasons.

PreceptDef.label: low
PreceptDef.description:
The rimworlds are inhospitable. We shouldn't expect comfortable lives.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Expectations lowered by 1 for everyone in the colony, except elite and supreme, which are unaffected for balance reasons.
